title: PET STANDARD Water Filters, Compatible with PETKIT Fountains, Pack of 6
features: [IMPORTANT] Compatible with PETKIT Fountains model Eversweet 2, Eversweet 3 and Cybertail Pure Drink. These are PET STANDARD branded filters and are not created or sold by PETKIT.
[Circle Pet Filter] Diameter of hollow circle is about 0.5 inch. Diameter is about 5.5 inch. Thickness is about 0.4 inch.

[Premium Quality Filters] Triple Filtration System: Composed of a high density micropore filter, activated carbon and an ion exchange resin. Effectively to filter hair, heavy metals, keeps water fresh and improve the taste of the water.

[Frequency Of Replacement] To prevent the activated carbon dust from shedding into water, please soak the cat fountain filter in water for 10 minutes then rinse thoroughly under running water before using. Replace every 1 to 2 weeks in summer and 2 to 4 weeks in winter. If multiple cats are using the fountain, more frequent replacement will be necessary. Please do not forget to reset the device, after replacing the filter.
[Premium 6 Pack Pet Fountain Filters] 6-pack of premium pet fountain replacement filters, individually packaged and sealed to maintain high quality. Enough supply for 1.5 to 6 months of use.
[Friendly Customer Service] Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about our products, we'd like to help you!
